Docs.summary: Base class for scoring rows independently. This assumes that all columns produced by the underlying should be exposed, as well as zero or more "derived" columns.

Docs.summary: This produces either "true" or "null" according to whether returns true or false. Note that this will never return false. Any derived class must support (but not necessarily prefer) parallel cursors.

Docs.summary: This should return true iff parallel cursors are advantageous. Typically, this will return true iff some columns added by this scorer are active.
